mapper.select: SELECT u.id AS userId, u.username, u.password, u.email, u.phone, u.status, u.display_name, u.status, r.id AS roleId, r.role_code AS roleCode, r.role_name AS roleName, r.description AS roleDescription FROM sys_user u LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON ur.role_id = r.id WHERE u.username = #{username}
